actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to deduct all expenses for their medical care, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits the tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, of all expenses paid by individuals for their medical care. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 213(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit individuals to deduct all expenses for their medical care, and for other purposes.
